Netfix is the ultimate Chrome extension designed to help you enjoy Netflix responsibly while staying in control of your time. Whether you're looking to curb endless binge-watching sessions, manage your daily screen time, or create healthier streaming habits, Netfix has got you covered.

Key Features
1. On-Screen Timer
See exactly how long you’ve been watching with a timer overlay displayed right on your Netflix screen.

2. Disable Autoplay
Disable autoplay to restrict binge watching complete series.

3.Daily & Weekly Limits
Set personalized time limits for how much Netflix you can watch per day or week. Netfix will block access once you’ve reached your limit.

4. Viewing Stats
Get an overview of your watch time based on daily and weekly basis.

5. Block recommendations
Disable recommendations to have mindful watching and get lesser prone to option overloads.
